name: I Cultivate Both God and Demon Dominating the World
author: 星灵动漫
content: In the era of myriad races, different species fight against each other to seize more resources, even going so far as to wage wars. Amidst the bloody battles and endless scheming, as the ancient human race fades into the river of history, a new human race rises through bloodshed, fighting for survival...
